imdb.plot outline: Go behind the scenes with Michael as he takes his family on the adventure of a life chasing his dreams of building a media empire. Life in the Frame is a show that gives a glimpse into the crazy life of the Mueller's. The ringleader husband and father, Michael Mueller owns a multimedia company, Michael Mueller Media, which is ran with his family and friends. Each episode is an adventure into all the amazing different projects they create.
imdb.title: Life in the Frame
plot: Go behind the scenes with Michael as he takes his family on the adventure of a life chasing his dreams of building a media empire. _Life in the Frame_ (qv) is a show that gives a glimpse into the crazy life of the Mueller's. The ringleader husband and father, Michael Mueller owns a multimedia company, Michael Mueller Media, which is ran with his family and friends. Each episode is an adventure into all the amazing different projects they create.
